name: SomeAntics
description:
Click on an object to see what Words it has. Then, you can take its words and join them to another object to change its properties!

Use left-click to click on things.

Use right-click to deselect everything. 

Press R to restart the current level. 

Press F4 to go fullscreen. 
Press F5 to show hitboxes if something is out of wack with collision.
Press F6 to show interactable hitboxes if something is out of wack with clicking.
Press F7 to go to Debug Land 😳.
Press ESC to exit.
